problem.markdown:
Consider the following DAX statement: CALCULATE([TotalRevenue],Manufacturer[Manufacturer]=”VanArsdel”)
>>What does this statement return?<<
( ) The value of the manufacturer VanArsdel ( ) The value of all manufacturers that have TotalRevenue ( ) The value of TotalRevenue for all manufacturers (x) The value of TotalRevenue for the VanArsdel manufacturer
[explanation] The statement returns the value of TotalRevenue for the VanArsdel manufacturer. [explanation]

choicegroup.label: What does this statement return?
choicegroup.choice: The value of the manufacturer VanArsdel
The value of all manufacturers that have TotalRevenue
The value of TotalRevenue for all manufacturers
The value of TotalRevenue for the VanArsdel manufacturer

div.p: The statement returns the value of TotalRevenue for the VanArsdel manufacturer.
